name: DynamoDB - Requests are being throttled for table {{tablename.name}} in {{region.name}} - DD Example
message:
Table {{tablename.name}} in {{region.name}} has been throttled. Please investigate

[Datadog DynamoDB dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/66/aws-dynamodb) 

See within [AWS Console](https://{{region.name}}.console.aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/home?region={{region.name}}#tables:)
